name: PaperMario-like coded animation and Physics warehouse example game
name_original: PaperMario-like coded animation and Physics warehouse example game
description:
This game/sourcecode has a bit of everything, animating a sprite through code...wobble back and forth... and change directions like paper mario(similar to vegetato's recent extension). The physics2 behaviour and tweens and lerps, timers and blends...and all of this code is discussed in the accompanying youtube video.

This is a for Gdevelop
